reuters.title: ULTRASYSTEMS <ULS> UNIT GETS DOD CONTRACTS
reuters.body: Ultrasystems Inc said the U.S. Defense Department awarded the company's Ultrasystems Defense and Space Inc unit several new contracts and extensions to existing contracts having a total value of more than 15.1 mln dlrs. The new awards involve software development and hardware integration for secure office automation systems, Ultrasystems said. Reuter 
